src.esercizio_esteso.crews.rag

RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) utilities package.

This package provides tools and utilities for implementing local RAG functionality using FAISS vector database and Azure OpenAI embeddings.

Modules

faiss_ragmodule

Core FAISS-based RAG implementation with vector search and retrieval.

Notes

The RAG system enables semantic search over local document collections, providing context-aware responses by combining retrieved information with language model generation capabilities.

The docs/ subdirectory contains example documents that can be indexed and searched using the RAG system.

Submodules

  • src.esercizio_esteso.crews.rag.docs
